verses.roman:
ei ta' kahiluṅ nityānandera vihāra
'ciḍā-dadhi-mahotsava'-nāme khyāti yāra

synonyms: ei ta'-in this way; kahiluṅ—I have described; nityānandera vihāra—the pastimes of Lord Nityānanda Prabhu; ciḍā-dadhi-mahotsava—the festival of eating chipped rice and yogurt; nāme—of the name; khyāti—the fame; yāra—of which.
translation: Thus I have described the pastimes of Lord Nityānanda Prabhu in relation to the celebrated festival of chipped rice and yogurt.
